title: HPE security advisory (AV25-833)
description: On December 12, 2025, HPE published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following product:
products: HPE ProLiant DL/ML/XD Alletra and Synergy Servers (multiple models)  Intel QuickAssist Technology (QAT) software drivers for MS Windows versions prior to v2.6.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
